mapper.select: select article.*,article.channel_id channelId,article.user_id userId,article.category_id categoryId,user.nickname from cms_article article,cms_user user WHERE article.user_id=user.id and article.deleted=0 AND article.`status`=1 AND article.hot>0 order by article.hot desc

select article.*,article.channel_id channelId,article.user_id userId,article.category_id categoryId from cms_article article WHERE article.deleted=0 AND article.`status`=1 order by article.created desc limit ${num}
select article.*,article.channel_id channelId,article.user_id userId,article.category_id categoryId from cms_article article where id=#{id}
select article.*,article.channel_id channelId,article.user_id userId,article.category_id categoryId from cms_article article where id in (${ids})
mapper.insert: insert into cms_article (title, picture, channel_id, category_id, user_id, hits, hot, status, deleted, created, updated, commentCnt, content) values (#{article.title}, #{article.picture}, #{article.channelId}, #{article.categoryId}, #{article.userId}, #{article.hits}, #{article.hot}, #{article.status}, #{article.deleted}, #{article.created}, #{article.updated}, #{article.commentcnt}, #{article.content})
mapper.update: update cms_article set title = #{article.title}, picture = #{article.picture}, channel_id = #{article.channelId}, category_id = #{article.categoryId}, user_id = #{article.userId}, status = #{article.status}, updated = #{article.updated}, commentCnt = #{article.commentcnt}, content = #{article.content} where id = #{article.id}
update cms_article set hot = hot+1 where id = #{id}
update cms_article set tousuCnt = tousuCnt+1 where id = #{id}
update cms_article set deleted = 1 where id = #{id}
update cms_article set deleted = 1 where id in (${ids})
